Headline: 63rd- Cottage Grove- bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd- Cottage Grove- bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick rider at Central. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd- Cottage Grove- bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick rider at Central.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Avenue/Bosworth
ShortDescription: 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Avenue, Ashland, Division and Elston due to street blockage, near North Avenue/Bosworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Avenue, Ashland, Division, Elston and over regular route, due to street blockage near North Avenue/Bosworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Northbound #6 Jackson Express Temporary Reroute near Stony Island/57th
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Express buses are temporarily rerouted near Stony Island/57th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 56th, Lake Park, 47th, King Drive, Cermak, Michigan, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Stony Island/57th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.
